授業目的: The purpose is to help students develop their ability to deliver a coherent presentation in front of an audience.
到達目標:
Students will learn and practice skills and language for delivering 
presentations.  This will include delivering the presentation using 
proper speaking techniques and gestures, along with creating an 
appropriate PowerPoint slide show to support the speaker.
授業方法: This class will consist of a mixture of lectures, in-class work on assignments, group work, and presentations.
